Raid Hour.title: Cobalion, Terrakion, and Virizion Raid Hour
Raid Hour.description: A Raid Hour featuring Cobalion, Terrakion, and Virizion is scheduled from 6 to 7 pm Local Time. During this hour there will be an increased number of 5-star Raids.

Raid Hour.title: Cobalion, Terrakion, and Virizion Raid Hour
Raid Hour.description: A Raid Hour featuring Cobalion, Terrakion, and Virizion is scheduled from 6 to 7 pm Local Time. During this hour there will be an increased number of 5-star Raids.

Raid Hour.title: Kyurem Raid Hour
Raid Hour.description: A Raid Hour featuring Kyurem is scheduled from 6 to 7 pm Local Time. During this hour there will be an increased number of 5-star Raids.

Raid Hour.title: Reshiram Raid Hour
Raid Hour.description: A Raid Hour featuring Reshiram is scheduled from 6 to 7 pm Local Time. During this hour there will be an increased number of 5-star Raids.

Raid Hour.title: Zekrom Raid Hour
Raid Hour.description: A Raid Hour featuring Zekrom is scheduled from 6 to 7 pm Local Time. During this hour there will be an increased number of 5-star Raids.

Raid Hour.title: Blacephalon Raid Hour
Raid Hour.description: A Raid Hour featuring Blacephalon is scheduled from 6 to 7 pm Local Time. During this hour there will be an increased number of 5-star Raids.

PokéStop Showcase.title: Fighting-type PokéStop Showcases
PokéStop Showcase.description: There will be PokéStop Showcases featuring Fighting-type Pokémon. Top the leaderboard to win rewards including Premium Items!

Community Day.title: Pikipek Community Day

bonuses: 1-hour Lures***
2x Catch Candy
2x Chance to receive Candy XL from catching Pokémon
3-hour Incense**
3x Catch XP
Increased Spawns
One additional Special Trade can be made for a maximum of three for the day*
Trades made will require 50% less Stardust*

Community Day.description:
Pikipek, the Woodpecker Pokémon, will be featured during November Community Day!
Please note, November Community Day will be the last Community Day where the featured Pokémon can have a Seasonal Special Background.
The Pokémon GO Team says they’re trying out new things for Community Day and will reevaluate these changes for next Season and onward.

Community Day.title: December Community Day 2025

bonuses: 1-hour Lures**
1/2 Hatch Distance when Eggs are placed into Incubators during the event period
2x Catch Candy
2x Chance to receive Candy XL from catching Pokémon
2x Stardust for catching Pokémon
2x XP for catching Pokémon
3-hour Incense**
Increased Spawns
One additional Special Trade can be made for a maximum of three for the day**
Trades made will require 50% less Stardust**

Community Day.description:
Pokémon from Community Days in 2025 return for an end of the year celebration!
The year is nearly behind us, which means it’s time to reflect on all the fun everyone had during this year’s Community Days. If you missed any, now’s your chance to catch up!
The last Community Day of 2025 will take place over two days—Saturday, December 6, 2025, and Sunday, December 7, 2025, from 2:00 p.m. to 5:00 p.m. local time.
Note: The only difference between Day 1 and Day 2 are the Pokémon appearing more frequently in the wild.

Community Day.title: January Community Day Classic
Community Day.description: January Community Day Classic is on January 4, 2026. Stay tuned for the announcement of the featured Pokémon.

Community Day.title: January Community Day
Community Day.description: January Community Day is on January 18, 2026. Stay tuned for the announcement of the featured Pokémon.

Community Day.title: February Community Day
Community Day.description: February Community Day is on February 1, 2026. Stay tuned for the announcement of the featured Pokémon.

Event.title: Final Justice

bonuses: Increased chance of encountering Shiny Hitmonlee, Shiny Hitmonchan, and Shiny Hitmontop
Receive up to two free Raid Passes from spinning Gym Photo Discs during the event

Event.description: Finish off Tales of Transformation with the Final Justice event, Keldeo’s Resolute Form, and Keldeo’s Shiny debut!

Event.title: Trade Days | Tales of Transformation

bonuses: -10% Stardust cost for trades
Earn two Candy XL from trades
Increased chance of Lucky Trade for any trade
One additional Special Trade

Event.description:
Enjoy trade bonuses every Sunday throughout Tales of Transformation!
On Sundays from September 7 to November 30, 2025, Trainers will get a pile of trade bonuses, including one additional Special Trade!

Event.title: GO Battle Week: Precious Paths
Event.description:
- 4× Stardust from win rewards. (This does not include end-of-set rewards.)
- The maximum number of sets you can play per day will increase from five to 20—for a total of 100 battles—from 12:00 a.m. to 11:59 p.m. local time.
- Pokémon encountered via GO Battle League rewards will have a wider variance of Attack, Defense, and HP.
- You can use a Charged TM to help a Shadow Pokémon forget the Charged Attack Frustration.
- Great League
- Ultra League
- Master League

Event.title: Journey to Paldea

bonuses: 2× XP for evolving Pokémon
2× XP for winning Raid Battles
Increased chance to encounter Shiny Larvitar and Shiny Bagon

Event.description: Journey to Paldea! Discover Nacli, Naclstack, and Garganacl making their Pokémon GO debuts!

Event.title: Well Armed
Event.description: The Well Armed event will take place from December 11, 2025 at 10 am to December 16, 2025 at 8 pm. Stay tuned for more details.

Event.title: Winter Holiday Part 1
Event.description: The Winter Holiday Part 1 event will take place from December 18, 2025 at 10 am to December 24, 2025 at 8 pm. Stay tuned for more details.

Event.title: Winter Weekend
Event.description: The Winter Weekend event will take place from December 27, 2025 at 10 am to December 28, 2025 at 8 pm. Stay tuned for more details.

Event.title: Winter Holiday Part 2
Event.description: The Winter Holiday Part 2 event will take place from December 24, 2025 at 10 am to December 29, 2025 at 8 pm. Stay tuned for more details.

Event.title: New Year's 2026
Event.description: The New Year’s 2026 event will take place from December 31, 2025 at 10 am to January 4, 2026 at 8 pm. Stay tuned for more details.

Event.title: Catch Mastery Day
Event.description: The Catch Mastery Day event will take place on February 7, 2026 from 10 am to 8 pm. Stay tuned for more details.

Max Battles.title: Dynamax Lugia Max Battle Weekend

bonuses: 1/4 Adventuring distance to receive Max Particles*
8× Max Particles from Power Spots
Max Particle collection limit increased to 1,600
Power Spots will refresh more frequently

Max Battles.description: Soaring in from the skies, Lugia makes its Dynamax debut!

Max Battles.title: Max Battle Day
Max Battles.description: The Max Battle Day event will take place on December 14, 2025 from 2 pm to 5 pm. Stay tuned for more details.

Max Battles.title: Max Battle Weekend
Max Battles.description: The Max Battle Weekend event will take place from January 31, 2026 at 6 am to February 1, 2026 at 9 pm. Stay tuned for more details.

Max Battles.title: Max Battle Day
Max Battles.description: The Max Battle Day event will take place on February 15, 2026 from 2 pm to 5 pm. Stay tuned for more details.

Max Mondays.title: Dynamax Darumaka during Max Monday
Max Mondays.description:
These Dynamax Pokémon may appear in Max Battles throughout Tales of Transformation. They will also take over Power Spots for an hour each week on Mondays from 6:00 p.m. to 7:00 p.m. local time!
On December 1, 2025, the featured Dynamax Pokémon is Darumaka.
- Darumaka

Max Mondays.title: Dynamax Cryogonal during Max Monday
Max Mondays.description:
These Dynamax Pokémon may appear in Max Battles throughout Precious Paths. They will also take over Power Spots for an hour each week on Mondays from 6:00 p.m. to 7:00 p.m. local time!
On December 8, 2025, the featured Dynamax Pokémon is Cryogonal.
- Cryogonal

Max Mondays.title: Dynamax Kabuto during Max Monday
Max Mondays.description:
These Dynamax Pokémon may appear in Max Battles throughout Precious Paths. They will also take over Power Spots for an hour each week on Mondays from 6:00 p.m. to 7:00 p.m. local time!

Max Mondays.title: Dynamax Spheal during Max Monday
Max Mondays.description:

Max Mondays.title: Dynamax Omanyte during Max Monday
Max Mondays.description:
These Dynamax Pokémon may appear in Max Battles throughout Precious Paths. They will also take over Power Spots for an hour each week on Mondays from 6:00 p.m. to 7:00 p.m. local time!

GO Pass.title: GO Pass: November

bonuses: 2× Daily Adventure Incense duration
2× Stardust and XP from hatching Eggs
Hold up to 30 Gifts in your Item Bag
Hold up to 40 Gifts in your Item Bag
Open up to 40 Gifts per day
Open up to 50 Gifts per day
Receive up to 125 Gifts per day from spinning PokéStop and Gym Photo Discs
Receive up to 150 Gifts per day from spinning PokéStop and Gym Photo Discs

GO Pass.description:
The Lucky Trinket returns in GO Pass: November!
From Tuesday, November 4, at 10:00 a.m. to Tuesday, December 2, at 10:00 a.m. local time, the GO Pass and GO Pass Deluxe for November will be available in Pokémon GO!

GO Pass.title: GO Pass: December

bonuses: 2× Daily Adventure Incense duration
Additional rewards for completing in-person raids and Max Battles
Hold up to 10 additional Gifts in your Item Bag
Hold up to 20 additional Gifts in your Item Bag
Open up to 40 Gifts per day
Open up to 50 Gifts per day
Receive up to 125 Gifts per day from spinning PokéStop and Gym Photo Discs
Receive up to 150 Gifts per day from spinning PokéStop and Gym Photo Discs

GO Pass.description:
Palkia and the Timed Incubator return for GO Pass: December!
From Tuesday, December 2, 2025, at 10:00 a.m. to Tuesday, January 6, 2026, at 10:00 a.m. local time, the GO Pass and GO Pass Deluxe for December will be available in Pokémon GO!

Season.title: Tales of Transformation

bonuses: Guaranteed Candy XL when trading Pokémon (Level 31+)
Guaranteed Rare Candy XL from five-star Raid Boss during Raid Hour (Level 31+)
Increased XP and Stardust for seven-day Pokémon catch streak
Increased XP for seven-day PokéStop spin streak
Increased XP from going up a Friendship level
One additional Candy when trading Pokémon

Season.description: Welcome to the next Pokémon GO Season: Tales of Transformation!

Season.title: Precious Paths

bonuses: Increased Stardust for the first catch of the day
Increased friendship bonus damage dealt by Pokémon in raids
One additional Special Trade per day

Season.description: Welcome to the next Pokémon GO Season: Precious Paths!

GO Battle League.title: Catch Cup: Tales of Transformation: Great Edition, Ultra League, and Master League | Tales of Transformation
GO Battle League.description:
The Catch Cup: Tales of Transformation: Great Edition, Ultra League, and Master League will run from November 25, 2025, at 1:00 p.m. to December 2, 2025, at 1:00 p.m. PT.
Trainers will also receive 4× Stardust from win rewards (this does not include end-of-set rewards).
- Pokémon must be at or below 1,500 CP to enter.
- Only Pokémon caught during the Tales of Transformation Season are eligible.
- Pokémon must be caught between September 2, 2025, at 1:00 p.m. and December 2, 2025, at 1:00 p.m. local time.
- Pokémon must be at or below 2,500 CP to enter.
- All Pokémon are eligible.

GO Battle League.title: Great League, Ultra League, and Master League | Precious Paths
GO Battle League.description:
The Great League, Ultra League, and Master League will run from December 2, 2025, at 1:00 p.m. to December 9, 2025, at 1:00 p.m. PT.
Trainers will also receive 4× Stardust from win rewards (this does not include end-of-set rewards).
- Pokémon must be at or below 1,500 CP to enter.
- Pokémon must be at or below 2,500 CP to enter.
- All Pokémon are eligible.

GO Battle League.title: Ultra League and Scroll Cup: Great League Edition | Precious Paths
GO Battle League.description:
The Ultra League and Scroll Cup: Great League Edition will run from December 9, 2025, at 1:00 p.m. to December 16, 2025, at 1:00 p.m. PT.
- Pokémon must be at or below 2,500 CP to enter.
- Pokémon must be at or below 1,500 CP to enter.
- Only Water-, Fighting-, and Dark-type Pokémon are eligible.
The following Pokémon will not be allowed.
- Primarina

GO Battle League.title: Master League and Holiday Cup: Great League Edition | Precious Paths
GO Battle League.description:
The Master League and Holiday Cup: Great League Edition will run from December 16, 2025, at 1:00 p.m. to December 23, 2025, at 1:00 p.m. PT.
Trainers will also receive 4× Stardust from win rewards (this does not include end-of-set rewards).
- All Pokémon are eligible.
- Pokémon must be at or below 1,500 CP to enter.
- Only Normal-, Grass-, Electric-, Ice-, Flying-, and Ghost-type Pokémon are eligible.

GO Battle League.title: Great League and Holiday Cup: Ultra League Edition | Precious Paths
GO Battle League.description:
The Great League and Holiday Cup: Ultra League Edition will run from December 23, 2025, at 1:00 p.m. to December 30, 2025, at 1:00 p.m. PT.
- Pokémon must be at or below 1,500 CP to enter.
- Pokémon must be at or below 2,500 CP to enter.
- Only Normal-, Grass-, Electric-, Ice-, Flying-, and Ghost-type Pokémon are eligible.

GO Battle League.title: Great League, Ultra League, and Master League | Precious Paths
GO Battle League.description:
The Great League, Ultra League, and Master League will run from December 30, 2025, at 1:00 p.m. to January 6, 2026, at 1:00 p.m. PT.
Trainers will also receive 4× Stardust from win rewards (this does not include end-of-set rewards).
- Pokémon must be at or below 1,500 CP to enter.
- Pokémon must be at or below 2,500 CP to enter.
- All Pokémon are eligible.

GO Battle League.title: Ultra League and Sunshine Cup: Great League Edition | Precious Paths
GO Battle League.description:
The Ultra League and Sunshine Cup: Great League Edition will run from January 6, 2026, at 1:00 p.m. to January 13, 2026, at 1:00 p.m. PT.
- Pokémon must be at or below 2,500 CP to enter.
- Pokémon must be at or below 1,500 CP to enter.
- Only Normal-, Fire-, Grass-, and Ground-type Pokémon are eligible.
- Charizard is not allowed.
The following Pokémon will not be allowed.
- Charizard

GO Battle League.title: Master Premier and Retro Cup: Great League Edition | Precious Paths
GO Battle League.description:
The Master Premier and Retro Cup: Great League Edition will run from January 13, 2026, at 1:00 p.m. to January 20, 2026, at 1:00 p.m. PT.
Trainers will also receive 4× Stardust from win rewards (this does not include end-of-set rewards).
- No CP limit.
- Legendary Pokémon, Mythical Pokémon, and Ultra Beasts are not eligible.
- Pokémon must be at or below 1,500 CP to enter.
- Dark-, Steel-, and Fairy-type Pokémon are not eligible.

GO Battle League.title: Great League and Ultra Premier | Precious Paths
GO Battle League.description:
The Great League and Ultra Premier will run from January 20, 2026, at 1:00 p.m. to January 27, 2026, at 1:00 p.m. PT.
- Pokémon must be at or below 1,500 CP to enter.
- Pokémon must be at or below 2,500 CP to enter.
- Legendary Pokémon, Mythical Pokémon, and Ultra Beasts are not eligible.

GO Battle League.title: Great League, Ultra League, and Master League | Precious Paths
GO Battle League.description:

Trainers will also receive 4× Stardust from win rewards (this does not include end-of-set rewards).
- Pokémon must be at or below 1,500 CP to enter.
- Pokémon must be at or below 2,500 CP to enter.
- All Pokémon are eligible.

GO Battle League.title: Ultra League and 2026 Championship Series Cup | Precious Paths
GO Battle League.description:
The Ultra League and 2026 Championship Series Cup will run from February 3, 2026, at 1:00 p.m. to February 10, 2026, at 1:00 p.m. PT.
- Pokémon must be at or below 2,500 CP to enter.
- Pokémon must be at or below 1,500 CP to enter.
- Only Bug-, Dark-, Normal-, and Dragon-type Pokémon are eligible.
- Fighting-, Flying-, and Steel-type Pokémon are not eligible.
- Legendary Pokémon, Mythical Pokémon, Mega Pokémon, and Ultra Beasts are not eligible.
- The following Pokémon will be allowed: Seaking, Politoed, Milotic, and Froslass.
The following Pokémon will not be allowed.
- Wigglytuff
- Chansey
- Crustle
- Diggersby
- Ribombee
- Araquanid
- Turtonator
- Morgrem
- Morpeko

GO Battle League.title: Master League and 2026 Championship Series Cup | Precious Paths
GO Battle League.description:
The Master League and 2026 Championship Series Cup will run from February 10, 2026, at 1:00 p.m. to February 17, 2026, at 1:00 p.m. PT.
Trainers will also receive 4× Stardust from win rewards (this does not include end-of-set rewards).
- All Pokémon are eligible.
- Pokémon must be at or below 1,500 CP to enter.
- Only Bug-, Dark-, Normal-, and Dragon-type Pokémon are eligible.
- Fighting-, Flying-, and Steel-type Pokémon are not eligible.
- Legendary Pokémon, Mythical Pokémon, Mega Pokémon, and Ultra Beasts are not eligible.

GO Battle League.description:

- Pokémon must be at or below 1,500 CP to enter.
- Pokémon must be at or below 1,500 CP to enter.
- Only red- or pink-colored Pokémon are eligible.

GO Battle League.title: Great League, Ultra League, and Master League: Mega Edition | Precious Paths
GO Battle League.description:
The Great League, Ultra League, and Master League: Mega Edition will run from February 24, 2026, at 1:00 p.m. to March 3, 2026, at 1:00 p.m. PT.
Trainers will also receive 4× Stardust from win rewards (this does not include end-of-set rewards).
- Pokémon must be at or below 1,500 CP to enter.
- Pokémon must be at or below 2,500 CP to enter.
- No CP limit.
- Mega-Evolved Pokémon are allowed.

Pokémon Spotlight Hour.title: Cranidos Spotlight Hour
Pokémon Spotlight Hour.description:
Pokémon Spotlight Hour will feature a different Pokémon and special bonus for one hour at 6:00 p.m. local time on Tuesday during the month of December.
December 2: The featured Pokémon is Cranidos and the special bonus is 2× Transfer Candy.

Pokémon Spotlight Hour.title: Shieldon Spotlight Hour
Pokémon Spotlight Hour.description:
Pokémon Spotlight Hour will feature a different Pokémon and special bonus for one hour at 6:00 p.m. local time on Tuesday during the month of December.
December 9: The featured Pokémon is Shieldon and the special bonus is 2× Catch XP.

Pokémon Spotlight Hour.title: Mienfoo Spotlight Hour
Pokémon Spotlight Hour.description:
Pokémon Spotlight Hour will feature a different Pokémon and special bonus for one hour at 6:00 p.m. local time on Tuesday during the month of December.
December 16: The featured Pokémon is Mienfoo and the special bonus is 2× Catch Candy.

Pokémon Spotlight Hour.title: Spheal Spotlight Hour
Pokémon Spotlight Hour.description:
Pokémon Spotlight Hour will feature a different Pokémon and special bonus for one hour at 6:00 p.m. local time on Tuesday during the month of December.
December 23: The featured Pokémon is Spheal and the special bonus is 2× Evolution XP.

Pokémon Spotlight Hour.title: Delibird Spotlight Hour
Pokémon Spotlight Hour.description:
Pokémon Spotlight Hour will feature a different Pokémon and special bonus for one hour at 6:00 p.m. local time on Tuesday during the month of December.
December 30: The featured Pokémon is Delibird and the special bonus is 2× Catch Stardust.

Raid Battles.title: Shadow Latios in Shadow Raids
Raid Battles.description:
Shadow Latios will return to Pokémon GO in Shadow Raids. If you’re lucky you’ll be able to encounter Shiny Shadow Latios!
Shadow Latios will appear in five-star Shadow Raids every weekend from November 2 to December 2:
- November 2
- November 8 - November 9
- November 15 - November 16
- November 22 - November 23
- November 29 - November 30

Raid Battles.title: Cobalion, Terrakion, and Virizion in 5-star Raid Battles
Raid Battles.description:
Cobalion, Terrakion, and Virizion will be in five-star raid battles from November 25, 2025 to December 4, 2025.
There will also be a Raid Hour featuring Cobalion, Terrakion, and Virizion from 6:00 pm to 7:00 pm local time on the following dates:
- November 26
- December 3

Raid Battles.title: Mega Aerodactyl, Mega Medicham, and Mega Garchomp in Mega Raids
Raid Battles.description: Mega Aerodactyl, Mega Medicham, and Mega Garchomp return to Mega Raids on November 25, 2025, at 10 am local time.

Raid Battles.title: Kyurem in 5-star Raid Battles
Raid Battles.description:
Kyurem will be in five-star raid battles from December 4, 2025 to December 13, 2025.
There will also be a Raid Hour featuring Kyurem from 6:00 pm to 7:00 pm local time on the following dates:
- December 10

Raid Battles.title: Mega Gyarados in Mega Raids
Raid Battles.description: Mega Gyarados return to Mega Raids on December 4, 2025, at 10 am local time.

Raid Battles.title: Mega Abomasnow in Mega Raids
Raid Battles.description: Mega Abomasnow return to Mega Raids on December 13, 2025, at 10 am local time.

Raid Battles.title: Reshiram in 5-star Raid Battles
Raid Battles.description:

There will also be a Raid Hour featuring Reshiram from 6:00 pm to 7:00 pm local time on the following dates:
- December 17

Raid Battles.title: Mega Glalie in Mega Raids
Raid Battles.description: Mega Glalie return to Mega Raids on December 22, 2025, at 10 am local time.

Raid Battles.title: Zekrom in 5-star Raid Battles
Raid Battles.description:
Zekrom will be in five-star raid battles from December 22, 2025 to December 31, 2025.
There will also be a Raid Hour featuring Zekrom from 6:00 pm to 7:00 pm local time on the following dates:
- December 24

Raid Battles.title: Shadow Heatran in Shadow Raids
Raid Battles.description:
Shadow Heatran will appear in Pokémon GO in Shadow Raids. If you’re lucky you’ll be able to encounter Shiny Shadow Heatran!
Shadow Heatran will appear in five-star Shadow Raids every weekend from December 2 to January 1:
- December 6 - December 7
- December 13 - December 14
- December 20 - December 21
- December 27 - December 28

City Safari.title: Sydney, Australia - Pokémon GO City Safari

bonuses: 1 additional Candy XL awarded for catching Pokémon in five-star raids and Mega Raids (Trainers level 31+)
1/2 Egg Hatch Distance
1/2 Stardust Cost for trades within the city
2× Hatch Candy
2× Hatch Stardust
2× Hatch XP
3 additional Candy awarded for catching Pokémon in five-star raids and Mega Raids
Additional 5,000 XP from completed raids
An increased chance of encountering Shiny Pokémon
Lure Modules (excluding Golden Lures) activated during the event will last for four hours
Lure Modules activated during the event will last for four hours
Trades will require 50% less Stardust
Up to 12 free Raid Passes per day by spinning Photo Discs at Gyms
Up to five Special Trades can be made during the day on your ticket while in Sydney!
Up to five Special Trades daily within the city
Your buddy may find the City Safari–exclusive Tiny Compass souvenir

City Safari.description:
Pokémon GO City Safari is coming to Sydney, Australia, on December 13 and 14, 2025! Set off on a citywide adventure as you discover the vibrant stories, new friends, and exciting Pokémon waiting for you in Sydney!
Whether you’re a resident of Sydney or a first-time visitor, your Pokémon GO City Safari will take you across the city in an all-new way—from historic landmarks to local favorites, get ready for a taste of the city with Pokémon GO by your side!
One-day Tickets are AU$19 (including any applicable taxes and fees) on either December 13, 2025 or December 14, 2025, from 10 am to 6 pm AEDT.

Pokémon GO Tour.description:
Other Event Locations:
- Los Angeles

Buy tickets: Pokémon GO Web Store
Join millions of Trainers across the globe for Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos – Global! Take part in this worldwide event inspired by the Kalos region, first featured in Pokémon X and Pokémon Y on the Nintendo 3DS.
Get ready to experience new gameplay inspired by the stories and characters of Pokémon X and Pokémon Y. From longtime Kalos fans to new Trainers picking up Pokémon GO for the first time, anyone can take part in this exciting two-day event at no cost!
Looking to enhance your GO Tour adventure with exclusive Special Research, additional bonuses, and an increased chance of encountering Shiny Pokémon? Purchase a global event ticket from the Pokémon GO Web Store!
